summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Alley in Block 128 A. A. Denny's Broadway Add. in the City of Seattle, by grading & paving under Ordinance No. 21182, creating Local Improvement District No. 2088 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
